task.title: Changing the current working copy
task.shortdesc: You can choose between previously used working copies or use the file browser to select one stored at a different location on your local drive.

context.note: You can safely switch between working copies without changing project files and even if your current working copy contains unstaged changes.

step.cmd: If you want to select a previous working copy, click the Working copy drop-down list and select the working copy that you want to use.
If you want to browse to a different working copy stored on your local drive, do the following:

substep.cmd: In the view, click Browse File System next to the Working Copy drop-down list.
In the Choose window, navigate to an existing local clone of a repository and click Choose.
If you are asked whether to store your SSH or HTTPS access credentials, answer the prompts appearing on the screen according to your preferences.
